definition: to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Noverre began ballet-making as it is known today.

sentences.english: I'm the director of educational programs for the EBC.

sentences.english: Yet, man choreographers will insist that you dance with your injury.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如斯，很多跳舞编导会对峙要你带伤跳舞。

sentences.english: Yao Xian, Shanxi native, is currently studying choreography at Beijing Dance Academy.

sentences.english: This part mainly analyses the characteristic of directors' thought in the knowledge television programs.
